text: Jung Jong-yeon (born October 6, 1963) is a South Korean television producer and director. Jeong is best known for producing and directing the popular reality shows The Genius, Society Game and The Great Escape. He also directed on Korea's Got Talent. ==Filmography== Ref: === As producer-director === {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- ! Year ! Title !
